locations.name: Reykjavik
locations.description: Iceland's capital and largest city, serving as the starting point for the tour, known for its colourful buildings, vibrant arts scene, and proximity to southwestern attractions.

locations.name: Troll Peninsula
locations.description: A remote and mountainous peninsula in Northern Iceland, emphasized in the tour for its dramatic landscapes, seclusion, exclusive experiences, and dark skies ideal for Northern Lights viewing.
